sentences.en: In that hotel, the service is achingly slow.
sentences.cn: 那家宾馆的服务慢极了.

sentences.en: It is achingly romantic. Experience Moorea with someone you love.
sentences.cn: 这景致十分浪漫, 和你所爱的人共同来体验茉莉亚岛吧.

sentences.en: The stream water was achingly cold.

trans.tran_cn: （因得不到而）渴望地，痛苦地，极其，十分
trans.tran_en: You can use achingly for emphasis when you are referring to things that create feelings of wanting something very much, but of not being able to have it
